problem.fixMessage: Seems like a syntax issue. <bpws:link> cannot exist as a child of <"links">
problem.message: <bpws:link> cannot be a child of <bpws:sequence>; it can only be a child of "links"
problem.ruleDescription: Check to make sure that my parent node is within a set of allowed nodes

problem.fixMessage: Add <"link"> to node <bpws:links> to satisfy the constraint.
problem.message: Node <bpws:links> must contain at least one node from "link"
problem.ruleDescription: Check my children nodes (types and occurances)

problem.fixMessage: Seems like a syntax issue. <bpws:links> cannot exist as a child of <"flow">
problem.message: <bpws:links> cannot be a child of <bpws:sequence>; it can only be a child of "flow"

problem.fixMessage: Seems like a syntax issue. <bpws:links> cannot exist as a child of <"flow">

problem.fixMessage: Choose unique name for bpws:scope "scope_foo"
problem.message: Immediately enclosed bpws:scope "scope_foo" must have a unique name within the outer scope "outer".
problem.ruleDescription: Within a scope all immediately enclosed scopes must have unique name

problem.context.name: name
problem.fixMessage: Set the "name" attribute to a valid NCName.
problem.message: The "name" attribute of this <bpws:flow> is set to "first flow" - it is not a valid NCName.
problem.ruleDescription: Check the name of the activity which must be valid NCName

problem.context.name: name
problem.fixMessage: You must change the name of bpws:link "B" to something else.

problem.context.name: name
problem.fixMessage: You must change the name of bpws:link "B" to something else.
problem.message: <bpws:link> name "B" is already defined in this scope/process.
problem.ruleDescription: Check for unique link name

problem.fixMessage: Link in BPEL must be unique - remove either "A" or "AA".
problem.message: The link "A" is not unique - the link "AA" also makes an identical connection.
problem.ruleDescription: Two different links MUST NOT share the same source *and* target activities; that is, at most one link may be used to connect two activities.

problem.message: The link "E" does not have a source.

problem.ruleDescription: Every link must have exactly one activity as source and one as target

problem.fixMessage: Define the link "Z".
problem.message: The link "Z" used as a bpws:target is not defined in the enclosing flow.
problem.ruleDescription: The value of the linkName attribute of <target> MUST be the name of a <link> declared in an enclosing <flow> activity.

problem.context.name: parallel
problem.fixMessage: Make sure that "parallel" is set to one of the values from "no", "yes"
problem.message: "parallel" is set to "true" on this <bpws:forEach> activity but it can only be set to "no", "yes"

problem.fixMessage: You must defined the variable to use it in the XPath expression.
problem.message: The variable "foo" is not defined in scope or process.
problem.ruleDescription: Check the variable namespace prefix

problem.fixMessage: Change the name of this variable.
problem.message: The variable name "counter3" is used as a counter name in <{http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsbpel/2.0/process/executable}forEach>.
problem.ruleDescription: For <forEach> the enclosed scope MUST NOT declare a variable with the same name as specified in the counterName attribute of <forEach>.
